landing_subtitle: Upload your 'Life Context' file to start a personalized conversation with an AI coach.
landing_dragDrop: Drag & drop your .md file here, or click to select
landing_error_invalidFile: Invalid file type. Please upload a .md (Markdown) file.
landing_error_emptyFile: The selected file is empty. Please choose a file with content.
landing_createFile: Create a new Life Context file
landing_privacyText: Your data is processed in-memory and is not stored unless you are logged into an account.
piiWarning_subtitle: Please review your file and remove any Personally Identifiable Information (PII) before proceeding. This is for your own privacy and security.
piiWarning_list:
Full names of you or others
Phone numbers, addresses, or email addresses
Social Security or other identification numbers
Financial or medical details
piiWarning_advice: You can use pseudonyms or generic descriptions instead.
questionnaire_subtitle: Answer these questions to generate a starting point for your Life Context file. You can always edit it later.
questionnaire_background_desc: Provide a brief overview of your current life situation.
questionnaire_background_work_prompt: e.g., Senior Software Engineer at a tech company, focusing on AI projects.
questionnaire_background_family_prompt: e.g., Married with two young children, living in a suburban area.
questionnaire_background_social_prompt: e.g., Enjoy hiking on weekends, part of a local book club.
questionnaire_background_health_prompt: e.g., Generally good health, trying to improve sleep habits.
questionnaire_background_sentiment_promp: e.g., Feeling motivated but a bit overwhelmed with work-life balance.
questionnaire_goals_2025_career_prompt: e.g., Get promoted to team lead, launch a personal side project.
questionnaire_goals_2025_personal_prompt: e.g., Run a half-marathon, read 20 books.
questionnaire_goals_2025_financial_promp: e.g., Save for a down payment, increase retirement contributions.
questionnaire_goals_longterm_big5_prompt: List the five most important things you want to achieve or experience in your life.
questionnaire_routines_desc: What does your typical day or week look like?
questionnaire_routines_focus_prompt: e.g., I struggle with procrastination in the afternoons.
questionnaire_routines_learning_prompt: e.g., I listen to podcasts during my commute but have no formal learning routine.
questionnaire_routines_ptm_prompt: e.g., I use a digital calendar but often get sidetracked by urgent but unimportant tasks.
questionnaire_routines_health_prompt: e.g., I go to the gym twice a week but my diet is inconsistent.
questionnaire_routines_growth_prompt: e.g., I journal occasionally but not consistently.
questionnaire_challenges_desc: What obstacles are you currently facing?
questionnaire_challenges_career_prompt: e.g., A difficult stakeholder is blocking my project.
questionnaire_challenges_wlb_prompt: e.g., I feel like I'm always 'on' and can't disconnect from work.
questionnaire_challenges_social_prompt: e.g., I haven't been making enough time for my friends.
questionnaire_challenges_growth_prompt: e.g., I know I need to be more assertive, but I avoid conflict.
questionnaire_collapsible_prompt: Click to expand and add your {{type}}.
botSelection_subtitle: Select a coach to begin your session. Each has a unique style and perspective.
botSelection_guestMessage: Create an account to unlock more coaches.
botSelection_registeredMessage: Redeem a code to unlock premium coaches.
chat_welcome: Hello, I'm {{botName}}. What's on your mind today?
chat_error: I'm sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again or restart the session.
chat_reportIssue: Report an issue with this response
analyzing_subtitle: Please wait a moment while we extract key insights.
sessionReview_subtitle: Here's a summary of your conversation and proposed updates to your Life Context.
sessionReview_blockages_subtitle: Based on Process and Embodiment-focused Psychology (PEP), these are potential unconscious patterns that may be hindering your progress.
sessionReview_no_blockages: No significant solution blockages were detected in this conversation.
sessionReview_preventSave_label: Do not save updates to my account for this session.
sessionReview_preventSave_desc: If you check this, you must download your context file to save your progress. Your account data will not be modified.
sessionReview_preventSave_continueDisabl: Saving is disabled. Please download your context file to proceed.
userGuide_p1: Welcome to Meaningful Conversations! This guide will help you get started.
userGuide_gettingStarted_p1: The core of this application is your 'Life Context' file. It's a simple text document in Markdown format that acts as the long-term memory for your AI coaches. To begin:
userGuide_gettingStarted_li1: Use the Questionnaire to create a new Life Context file from scratch.
userGuide_gettingStarted_li2: Upload an existing `.md` file if you have one.
userGuide_gettingStarted_li3: Continue as a guest for maximum privacy (you'll need to download your file to save it) or create an account to have your progress saved automatically.
userGuide_theSession_p1: Once you have a context, choose a coach that fits your needs. Each coach has a unique style. During the conversation, you can use the controls at the top to switch between text and voice mode, or to end the session.
userGuide_theSession_p2: In voice mode, you can speak directly to the coach and hear their responses.
userGuide_sessionReview_p1: After you end a session, the AI analyzes your conversation. It will present you with key findings and propose specific updates to your Life Context file.
userGuide_sessionReview_p2: You can accept, reject, or modify these proposals before continuing to your next session or downloading the updated file.
userGuide_gamification_p1: Creating an account automatically unlocks the coach Chloe. Other premium coaches can be unlocked by redeeming a special code via the 'Redeem Code' option in the main menu. As you complete sessions, you'll earn XP and unlock achievements. You can view your progress in the gamification bar at the top of the screen and see your unlocked achievements by clicking the trophy icon.
userGuide_account_p2: You can manage your account via the options in the main menu, including changing your password or deleting your account. Account deletion is permanent and can be found in the 'Disclaimer' section.
formatting_p1: Your Life Context file uses Markdown, a simple way to format text. Using clear headings helps the AI understand the structure of your document. Here are the basics:
formatting_headings_p1: Use hashtags (#) for main section titles and sub-sections. This is the most important formatting element.
formatting_headings_code:
## My Main Goal
### Key Result 1
### Key Result 2
formatting_bold_p1: For single-line topics, using bold text for the key can also work well as a headline.
formatting_lists_p1: Use hyphens or asterisks for bullet points.
formatting_manual_p1: You can edit your context file at any time. When the AI proposes updates, you have full control to edit the text in the 'Final Context File' section before saving or downloading.
formatting_manual_p2: Keeping your file well-organized will lead to more insightful coaching sessions.
faq_q1_a: Yes. If you use 'Guest Mode', your data is only processed in-memory for the duration of your session and is never stored. If you create an account, your data is securely stored so you can access it again.
faq_q2_a: It's a simple text file in Markdown format (.md) that acts as a long-term memory for your AI coach. It helps the coach understand your background, goals, and challenges for more personalized conversations.
faq_q3_q: Can I use the app without a file?
faq_q3_a: Yes, you can start with an empty context by using the questionnaire to create a new file. The file will be built up over time with insights from your sessions.
faq_q4_q: Why does the session end automatically?
faq_q4_a: Sessions are designed to be focused. An automatic timeout may be in place to encourage regular review and integration of insights.
faq_q5_q: What is the difference between Guest Mode and having an account?
faq_q5_a: The main difference is how your data is handled:
faq_q5_a_li1: Guest Mode: Maximum privacy. You are responsible for uploading and downloading your context file each session. Nothing is saved on the server.
faq_q5_a_li2: Registered Account: Convenience. Your context and progress are automatically saved to your account, allowing you to pick up where you left off on any device.
faq_q5_a_footer: Both modes offer the same core coaching experience.
faq_q6_q: How does the 'Forgot Password' feature work?
faq_q6_a: When you request a password reset, a support ticket is automatically created for our team. We will then contact you to assist with the manual reset process. This is for enhanced security in the current version.
about_p1: This application is designed to be a private, secure space for self-reflection, powered by advanced AI. Our goal is to provide a tool that helps you structure your thoughts, gain clarity on your goals, and navigate life's challenges with a helpful digital partner.
about_mission_p1: We believe that technology can be a powerful force for personal growth. Our mission is to create accessible, private, and effective tools that empower individuals to lead more meaningful and intentional lives.
about_howitworks_p1: The app combines the power of large language models with established coaching frameworks. Each AI coach is given a unique 'persona' and system prompt that guides their conversational style and methodology. Your Life Context file provides the long-term memory, allowing for conversations that are not only coherent but also progressively deeper over time.
disclaimer_p1: This application provides AI-generated content for informational and self-reflection purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional advice.
disclaimer_professional_title: Not a Substitute for Professional Advice
disclaimer_professional_p1: The AI coaches are not licensed therapists, counselors, or financial advisors. The conversations you have should not be considered professional medical, legal, financial, or psychological advice. Always consult with a qualified professional for any serious concerns.
disclaimer_guarantees_p1: We make no guarantees about the accuracy, reliability, or effectiveness of the advice or insights provided by the AI. Your life decisions are your own, and you use the information provided at your own risk.
disclaimer_delete_warning: Account deletion is irreversible. All your data, including your life context and progress, will be permanently removed. To proceed, you must type 'DELETE' in the confirmation box.
terms_p1: By using this application, you agree to the following terms and conditions.
terms_conduct_p1: You agree to use this application for lawful and ethical purposes. You will not use it to generate harmful, hateful, or illegal content. Misuse of the service may result in termination of your account.
terms_availability_p1: We strive to keep the service available, but we do not guarantee uninterrupted access. The service may be taken down for maintenance or other reasons without prior notice.
terms_liability_p1: In no event shall the creators of this application be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on this application.
auth_subtitle: Log in to sync your progress or continue as a guest.
login_error_credentials: Login failed. Please check your email and password.
register_error_short_password: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
register_error_exists: An account with this email address already exists.
contextChoice_subtitle: Would you like to continue with your saved Life Context or start a new session with a different file?
contextChoice_start_new: Start new session with file upload
forgotPassword_subtitle: Enter your email address to request a password reset. Our team will contact you to assist.
forgotPassword_success: Your request has been submitted. The support team will contact you to assist with the reset.
achievement_beta_pioneer_desc: Thank you for being one of the first to use this app!
achievement_streak_starter_desc: Maintain a session streak of 3 days.
achievement_polymath_desc: Complete a session with at least 3 different coaches.
blockageScore_subtitle: This score indicates the potential intensity of solution blockages detected during the conversation. A higher score suggests that these patterns may be more influential.
voiceModal_auto_desc: The system will select the best voice based on your language and the coach's gender.
voiceModal_preview_text: Hello, this is a preview of the selected voice.
voiceModal_noVoices_advice: Try installing more system voices for a better experience.
redeem_subtitle: Enter an upgrade code to unlock a new coach.
redeem_success: Success! You have unlocked new content.
redeem_error_invalid: This code is invalid or has already been used.
redeem_error_generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
admin_users_reset_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset the password for {{email}}? A new temporary password will be generated.
admin_no_users_found: No users found matching your search.
admin_no_codes_yet: No codes have been generated yet.
admin_reset_success_desc: The password for {{email}} has been changed. Please provide the user with their new temporary password.
changePassword_error_short: New password must be at least 6 characters long.
changePassword_error_incorrect: Your current password is not correct.
changePassword_error_generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
deleteAccount_warning: This action is permanent and cannot be undone. All your data, including your Life Context and achievements, will be permanently erased.
deleteAccount_confirmation: To confirm, please type the following text into the box below: {{requiredText}}
deleteAccount_error_mismatch: The confirmation text does not match.
deleteAccount_error_api: An error occurred while deleting your account. Please try again.
feedback_description: Thank you for helping us improve. Please provide details about the issue with this response.
feedback_commentsPlaceholder: e.g., The response was not helpful, it repeated itself, etc.
feedback_emailPlaceholder: So we can follow up with you
feedback_successMessage: Thank you! Your feedback has been received and will help us improve the experience.
